import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react'; import { AppContext } from '../Context/AppContext'; import Table from './Table'; const AddOrder = ({ table, handleGoBack, handleCategory, selectedCategory, handleAddProduct, }) => { const [dispatch] = useContext(AppContext); const [tables] = useContext(AppContext); const [categories] = useContext(AppContext); const [categoryClicked, isCategoryClicked] = useState(false); const [totalPrice, setTotalPrice] = useState(0); const [selectedTable, setSelectedTable] = useState(table); const handleChange = (product, price) => {}; return (
Table: {table.number}
Products QTY Total
{selectedTable.order.products.map((product, i) => ( {product}
))} {selectedTable.order.quantities.map((quantity, i) => ( {quantity}
))} {selectedTable.order.prices.map((price, i) => ( {price} €
))}
{categories.map((category, i) => selectedCategory === category.Category ? (
handleChange(category.name, category.price)} > {category.name} {category.price} €
) : null )}
); }; export default AddOrder;
